sources.title: Behind the Mask: The Batman Dead End Story (Free Doc) Sandy Collora
sources.description:
Documentary about the making of the classic Batman fan-film BATMAN: DEAD END and its creator Sandy Collora. Find out the story behind the short film that reignited a genre and the filmmaker who made it happen.

Directed by Eric Dow
2015
Neal Adams, Clark Bartram, Kurt Carley

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: Dr. Bob Shushan is an overworked and absent father who runs a centre for the mentally and physically challenged. When Shushan suffers a heart attack, his life is saved by James Jones, a young patient at the center. The two men forge a friendship and help each other rekindle the father-son bond that has been missing in their lives.
metadata.Writer: Robert Shushan, James Jones, Gregory Goodell
metadata.Actors: Donald Sutherland, Matthew Fox, Mary McDonnell
